title: An historicall narration of the iudgement of some most learned and godly English bishops, holy martyrs, and others (whereof III; viz. Archbishop Cranmer, B. Latimer, and Bishop Hooper, suffred martyrdome, in the dayes of Q. Mary, for the truth and Gospell of Christ Iesus) concerning Gods election, and the merit of Christ his death, &c.
author: J. A., of Ailward.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] and T[homas] F[awcet] for Samuel Nealand, and are to be sold his shop at the signe of the Crowne in Duck-Lane,
